metadata.title: CVE-2024-47211 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In OpenStack Ironic before 21.4.4, 22.x and 23.x before 23.0.3, 23.x and24.x before 24.1.3, and 25.x and 26.x before 26.1.0, there is a lack ofchecksum validation of supplied image_source URLs when configured toconvert images to a raw format for streaming.

criterions.comment: ironic package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
